page.title: 09LEISURE:N.E. ST.ALBANS
page.content: The{leisure facilities}seem to be adequate for all except the 15 to 25 yr. olds. The latter tend to go into St. Albans City Centre, London or Watford.{UNDER 5'S.}The playgroups are held at Jersey Lane Tennis Club, Marshalswick Community Centre, Baptist Hall in Sherwood Avenue and Fleetville Community Centre.{YOUTH GROUPS.}GUIDES and BROWNIES meet at St. Paul's, the United Reformed Church, St. Mary's and Slimmons Drive. YOUTH CLUBS meet at Homewood Road, Marshalswick Community Centre, St. Mary's and Fleetville Community Centre.{ADULT CLUBS.} National Housewives Register, Marshalswick Mothers' Club, Elizabethan Club, Evergreen Club for the elderly. {SPORTS CLUBS.}Jersey Lane Tennis Club, Sherwood Ave. Tennis Club. There are various football clubs.
